headline: Show HN: With a one click declutter your desktop in meetings or in public places
description:
I was inspired by other builders who were working on mac apps, so I wanted to build a mac app.

What is it? Have you ever been in an awkward situation where you wanted to hide all of your desktop icons or windows during a meeting but couldn’t do it fast? Have you ever been encountered in a situation where you believed you were on mute in the meeting but were not? If you want to avoid those problems in the future, then you are in the right place.

Zen mode — Hide Everything. Mute Everything is a single click tool that lets you hide desktop icons, hide inactive windows, mute mic or speakers.

Here is a quick video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wT2PdPg-RZo

You can try the app here: https://zen-mode.carrd.co/

more features coming soon...
